title: Mr. Holmes
desc: An aged, retired Sherlock Holmes deals with dementia, as he tries to remember his final case, and a mysterious woman, whose memory haunts him. He also befriends a fan, the young son of his housekeeper, who wants him to work again.

title: Sherlock Holmes: A Game of Shadows
desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes is on the trail of criminal mastermind Professor Moriarty, who is carrying out a string of random crimes across Europe.

title: Holmes & Watson: Madrid Days
desc: Sherlock Homes and Doctor Watson go to Madrid to look for Jack the Ripper.

title: Sherlock
desc: A modern update finds the famous sleuth and his doctor partner solving crime in 21st century London.

title: Sherlock Holmes
desc: Detective Sherlock Holmes and his stalwart partner Watson engage in a battle of wits and brawn with a nemesis whose plot is a threat to all of England.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Case of the Silk Stocking
desc: A serial killer stalking the teen-aged daughters of the aristocracy brings Sherlock Holmes out of his drug-filled semi-retirement.

title: Sherlock
desc: Early in his crime-solving career, Sherlock Holmes attempts to prevent Moriarty from cornering the heroin market.

title: The Case of the Whitechapel Vampire
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of death rumoured to be caused by a vampire.

title: Sherlock Holmes Returns
desc: Sherlock Holmes is awakened in modern times with a tale that he had invented a method of suspended animation that he had used on himself. Awakened by an earthquake, he is helped by Amy ... See full summary »

title: Sherlock Holmes: Incident at Victoria Falls
desc: King Edward ask Sherlock Holmes to perform one more task before his retirement: to safeguard the Star of Africa on a trip to Cape Town. Soon the fabled jewel is stolen and several people end up being murdered.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Leading Lady
desc: 1910. Mycroft Holmes asks his brother Sherlock and Dr. Watson to travel to Vienna and find the stolen plans and prototype for an electromagnetic bomb detonator. Once there, they are ... See full summary »

title: Without a Clue
desc: A drunken Sherlock Holmes is really just a cover for the real detective, Dr. Watson.

title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
desc: Sherlock Holmes is brought back to life by Watson's female descendant after being cryogenically frozen for eighty years.

title: The Great Mouse Detective
desc: Basil, the rodent Sherlock Holmes, investigates the kidnapping of a toy maker and uncovers its link to his archenemy, Professor Ratigan.

title: The Return of Sherlock Holmes
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of the devil's foot, Silver Blaze, Wisteria Lodge and the Bruce-Partington Plans.

title: Young Sherlock Holmes
desc: When assorted people start having inexplicable delusions that lead to their deaths, a teenage Sherlock Holmes decides to investigate.

title: The Masks of Death
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates the case of a string of mysterious deaths with no apparent causes and the case of a missing German Prince that could cause war between England and Germany.

title: Murder, She WroteThe Murder of Sherlock Holmes
desc: Former English teacher Jessica Fletcher travels to New York to celebrate the success of her debut novel. But when an unwanted guest is murdered by gunfire at a costume party, she wishes she'd stayed home.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson solve the mysteries of copper beeches, a Greek interpreter, the Norwood builder, a resident patient, the red-headed league, and one final problem.

title: Standing Room OnlySherlock Holmes
desc: Professor Moriarty returns to kill Sherlock Holmes and unleashes a complex and clever plan to lure the great detective to his death.

title: Murder by Decree
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates the murders commited by Jack the Ripper and discovers a conspiracy to protect the killer.

title: The Seven-Per-Cent Solution
desc: To treat his friend's cocaine induced delusions, Watson lures Sherlock Holmes to Sigmund Freud.

title: Sherlock Holmes in New York
desc: In this mystery, Sherlock Holmes pursues his archenemy Professor James Moriarty to New York City, in which the villainous scoundrel has carried out the ultimate bank robbery. Meanwhile, ... See full summary »

title: The Adventure of Sherlock Holmes' Smarter Brother
desc: The younger brother of the consulting detective tries to steal Sherlock's glory by solving an important case assisted by an eccentric Scotland Yard detective and a lovely but suspicious actress.

title: The Private Life of Sherlock Holmes
desc: When a bored Holmes eagerly takes the case of Gabrielle Valladon after an attempt on her life, the search for her missing husband leads to Loch Ness and the legendary monster.

title: A Study in Terror
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr. John H. Watson join the hunt for the notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper.

title: Sherlock Holmes
desc: A series of Sherlock Holmes adaptations, based on the stories of Sir Arthur Conan Doyle.

title: Sherlock Holmes und das Halsband des Todes
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Watson do battle with their nemesis, Professor Moriarity, over an ancient necklace attributed to Cleopatra.

title: Sherlock Holmes
desc: The adventures of master detective Sherlock Holmes as he and his assistant, Dr. Watson--and, somewhat reluctantly, the bumbling Inspector Lestrade--battle criminals in London.

title: Terror by Night
desc: When the fabled Star of Rhodesia diamond is stolen on a London to Edinburgh train and the son of its owner is murdered, Sherlock Holmes must discover which of his suspicious fellow passengers is responsible.

title: Dressed to Kill
desc: Sherlock Holmes sets out to discover why a trio of murderous villains, including a dangerously attractive female, are desperate to obtain three unassuming and inexpensive little music boxes.

title: The Woman in Green
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates when young women around London turn up murdered, each with a finger severed. Scotland Yard suspects a madman, but Holmes believes the killings to be part of a diabolical plot.

title: The House of Fear
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of deaths at a castle with each foretold by the delivery of orange pips to the victims.

title: Pursuit to Algiers
desc: Holmes is recruited to escort the heir to a European throne safely back to his homeland after his father's assassination.

title: The Spider Woman
desc: Sherlock Holmes investigates a series of so-called "pajama suicides". He knows the female villain behind them is as cunning as Moriarty and as venomous as a spider.

title: The Pearl of Death
desc: When a valuable pearl with a sinister reputation is stolen, Sherlock Holmes must investigate its link to a series of brutal murders.

title: The Scarlet Claw
desc: When a gentlewoman is found dead with her throat torn out, the villagers blame a supernatural monster. But Sherlock Holmes, who gets drawn into the case from nearby Quebec, suspects a human murderer.

title: Sherlock Holmes in Washington
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson travel to Washington D.C. in order to prevent a secret document from falling into enemy hands.

title: Sherlock Holmes Faces Death
desc: During WWII several murders occur at a convalescent home where Dr. Watson has volunteered his services. He summons Holmes for help and the master detective proceeds to solve the crime from ... See full summary »

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Secret Weapon
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Doctor Watson must protect a Swiss inventor of an advanced bomb sight from falling into German hands.

title: Sherlock Holmes and the Voice of Terror
desc: When a Nazi saboteur jeeringly predicts to the nation new depredations, via their radio 'Voice of Terror', the Intellegence Inner Council summons Sherlock Holmes (Basil Rathbone) to help in the crisis.

title: The Adventures of Sherlock Holmes
desc: The master sleuth hunts his archenemy, Professor Moriarty, who is planning the crime of the century.

title: The Hound of the Baskervilles
desc: Sherlock Holmes and Dr Watson investigate the legend of a supernatural hound, a beast that may be stalking a young heir on the fog-shrouded moorland that makes up his estate.

title: Silver Blaze
desc: Sherlock Holmes takes a vacation and visits his old friend Sir Henry Baskerville. His vacation ends when he suddenly finds himself in the middle of a double-murder mystery. Now he's got to ... See full summary »

title: The Triumph of Sherlock Holmes
desc: Holmes, retired to Sussex, is drawn into a last case when arch enemy Moriarty arranges with an American gang to kill one John Douglas, a country gentleman with a mysterious past. Holmes' ... See full summary »

title: The Sign of Four: Sherlock Holmes' Greatest Case
desc: A young woman turns to Sherlock Holmes for protection when she's menaced by an escaped killer seeking missing treasure. However, when the woman is kidnapped, Holmes and Watson must penetrate the city's criminal underworld to find her.

title: The Missing Rembrandt
desc: Sherlock Holmes goes on the trail of a Rembrandt painting, stolen by a drug-addicted artist.

title: The Sleeping Cardinal
desc: A card cheat is threatened with exposure into joining a criminal enterprise that Holmes believes is controlled by Professor Moriarty.

title: Sherlock Jr.
desc: A film projectionist longs to be a detective, and puts his meagre skills to work when he is framed by a rival for stealing his girlfriend's father's pocketwatch.

title: Sherlock Holmes
desc: A young Sherlock Holmes seeks to bring down the criminal mastermind Moriarty as he solves a crime involving a blackmailed prince.

title: Der Hund von Baskerville
desc: In this early version the classic "Hound of the Baskervilles" mystery is not faithfully adapted, Watson's character is absent and there are two Holmes. Holmes' foe is called Stapleton and he menaces Holmes' client Lord Henry and his fiancée, Laura Lyons, masquerading himself as Holmes. Hidden passages, hand bombs and mechanical devices abound, reminding more of a serial than of a Conan Doyle ... See full summary »

title: Sherlock Holmes Baffled
desc: Sherlock Holmes enters his drawing room to find it being burgled, but on confronting the villain is surprised when the latter disappears. Holmes initially attempts to ignore the event by ... See full summary »
